title: will I get the 20 min leavebuster again?
body:
So I rarely leave matches but lately I have had to leave a few and right now I am in the 20 min queue and I was wondering after I have done all 5 leavebuster's will I go back to 5 min waiting if I ever leave again or will I get 20 min again or will I be banned?

Edit: sat through the whole queue only to lag and miss clicking accept so now I have to sit through it again!
This is really making me want to quit league cause it just isn't really worth the wait

replies.body:
Having to wait to queue can certainly be frustrating and I can see that, but it's also there to protect players.  It'is a good net in case of an issue like this, where you do end up lagging out anyway.  This time is a great period to troubleshoot whatever is causing that to happen.  Let me know if I can help with that.

The key here is consistency.  Even though you finish your required games, you need to keep playing consistently without issues.  If you leave again too soon, it's likely that you'll receive another penalty with a long wait time.  More information is also available through our [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) guide, but let me know if that helps clear things up.
